title: Thunderstorm at the Shore
medium: oil on paper mounted on canvas attached to panel
credit_line: Howard N. Eavenson Memorial Fund for the Howard N. Eavenson Americana Collection
provenance_text: General William Josiah Snow [1868-1947], Blue Ridge Summit, PA; by descent to his heirs; Estate of his descendants; Unknown dealer, Ellicot City, MD, until 1967; John M. Swanner, Washington, D. C., 1967 until 1971; Hirschl and Adler Galleries, New York, 1972; purchased by Museum, 1972.

creator.death_place: Saint Augustine (Saint Johns county, Florida, United States)
